quoteText:
Some cookies may also be placed on your device, when using the Riot services, by one of our partners.
These cookies are called “third party” cookies and are used to provide services to us and others.
Therefore, some cookies that have been set on the Riot services are not related to Riot Games.
When you visit a Riot service with content embedded from, say Google’s DoubleClick, Nanigans.com or Ad4game.com, these partners may set their own cookies on your web browser.
title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
